string.name: name
string.value: Another Clue about the Onyx Dragon

string.name: parent
string.value: Information about the Slumbering Dragon Island
#p1032001# in #m101000000# starts talking to you. Could there be some more information about Onyx Dragons? Respond to #p1032001#'s call.
#p1032001# says that there is a new book that came into the #b#m101000003##k that is very interesting. He says that it may be a clue about the Onyx Dragons and asks that you come check it out.
You met #p1032001# and asked about the book.

It's been a long time, researcher of Onyx Dragons. I have called you because I found a book you might be interested in. This book appears to be an ordinary diary, but it contains a line that might interest you.
I think it will help you with your research, so if you want to read it, come to #m101000003##k in #b#m101000000#. I'll hold on to the book and won't let anyone borrow it.
It has an explanation that seems to indicate something about Onyx Dragons. No one knows whether what it says here is true or not, but that is why you must verify the facts. I'll be waiting.
You can't come? That's too bad. I'll have to make the book available for anyone that wants to borrow it.
Oh, I'm glad you came. Wait here for a second. I'll take out the book I told you about. Let me see where that Voyage Log is...
